name: permitpath-simple
description: A **fully working, beautiful app** that's: - ✅ **Simple** - 4th grade reading level - ✅ **Beautiful** - Gorgeous design with smooth animations - ✅ **Intuitive** - Easy to use, no training needed - ✅ **Mobile-Friendly** - Works great on phones - ✅ **Fast** - No build tools, just pure HTML/CSS/JS
